alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 8:27PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Kittson, Pembina, Marshall and Walsh Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Grand Forks, Walsh, Marshall and Polk Counties. Red River of the North at Halstad affecting Norman and Traill Counties. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Grand Forks and Polk Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Clay and Cass Counties. Red River of the North at Wahpeton affecting Richland and Wilkin Counties. Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at East Grand Forks. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 42.0 feet, Road entering Riverside Park is closed. (Grand Forks) * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 40.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CDT Friday was 40.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 42.5 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
